navE#dAq yaSa#svatIrapaqsyuvOq na saqtyAH ||
A tE# supaqrNA a#minantaq Evai$H kRuqShNO nO#nAva vRuShaqBO yadIqdaM | 
SiqvABiqrna smaya#mAnABiqrA&gAqt pata#ntiq miha#H staqnaya#ntyaqBrA || 
vAqSrEva# viqdyunmi#mAti vaqthsaM na mAqtA 
si#Shakti | 
yadE#ShAM ~MvRuqShTirasa#rji || 
parva#taSciqnmahi# vRuqddhO bi#BAya diqvaSciqth sAnu# rEjata svaqnE va#H | 
yat krIDa#tha maruta - [  ]   39
